definition: A handwritten symbol or mark made by an individual to authenticate or endorse a document, agreement, or piece of writing, typically used as a form of personal identification or confirmation of consent. It is commonly employed to finalize legal contracts, official paperwork, or formal letters.

examples.german: Bitte geben Sie Ihre Unterschrift am Ende des Dokuments ab.
examples.english: Please provide your signature at the end of the document.
